rows.label: tlk70000119_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, hi! Your group's grown since last
time, right?

rows.label: tlk70000119_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I guess that means you can do some
pretty cool Blade Combos when your
friends make combo requests, huh?

rows.label: tlk70000119_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Did you know? Blade Combos happen
when you chain Specials together in
the right way.

rows.label: tlk70000119_02_msg0004
rows.name:
They can have up to three levels.
Of course, the more you chain,
the more powerful they'll be.

rows.label: tlk70000119_02_msg0005
rows.name:
To keep a Blade Combo going, you'll
need to chain the right level moves
together with the right timing and stuff.

rows.label: tlk70000119_02_msg0006
rows.name:
That's where combo requests come in!
After using a Special, accept a combo
request and watch the magic happen!

rows.label: tlk70000119_02_msg0007
rows.name:
Well, that's Blade Combos in
a nutshell.

rows.label: tlk70000119_02_msg0008
rows.name:
Wish I could accept some combo
requests, but I suppose you need
friends for that...*sniff*
